title: Can I apply for the NDA exam when I am still studying in 12th? - Quora

response.answer_text: Just check if your age falls in this criteria then you are eligibleThe interested candidates can apply for the NDA 2018 from 15th January 2018 (for NDA I) and from 6th June 2018 (for NDA II)Age Limits, Gender & Marital Status:For NDA (1) 2018: The candidates possessing age between 2nd July 1999 to 1st July 2002 are eligible for the examination. If born before 2nd July 1999 and after 1st July 2002 then not eligible for NDA (1) 2018 exam.For NDA (2) 2018: Those who have age between 2nd January 2000 to 1st January 2003 are permitted to write the exam. If the candidate bears the age before 2nd January 2000 and after 1st January 2003, they are not allowed to appear the exam.Only unmarried male candidates are eligible for NDA examination. Girls are not allowed for the NDA entrance examination.Qualification Criteria:The minimum qualification required for Indian Army wing, Navy and Air Force is as follows:Eligibility for Indian Army:The candidates want to apply for Indian Army must have completed 12th (10+2 pattern) or its equivalent exam from a well-recognized board.The appearing candidates can also apply.Eligibility for Indian Navy and Air Force:Those seeking for Indian Navy and Air Force must have passed their 12th/appearing (10+2 pattern) from a recognized board or University with Physics and Mathematics as a compulsory subject.ALL THE BEST

Yes for sure. I think the application forms are out now, So please go on and prepare well for your exam. Firstly focus over your Maths (300 marks) , if you want to qualify maths section then you need to answer minimum 36 - 37 questions correctly (just to clear the cut off). Secondly for the GAT (600 marks) you need to mainly focus on General Studies [ i.e. history (modern history) , polity (questions relating to articles), geography (thoroughly take a look at atlas), economy (five years plans) and yes don't forget to check out the current affairs ] And for General Science and English exams you don't have to take much stress. Usually candidates are not able to clear the exam just because they might have failed to clear the Maths or General Studies cut off. So, you have to focus a bit more on the pattern of the exam. All the best for your exam. If any other questions then ask in comment section, I'll answer soon. Hope it helps.

A class 12th student can appear for NDA written exam while he is in 12th class. You should appear for Oct/Nov exam while in second half of 12th. So your NDA result will be out in Jan/Feb and thereafter you can appear for your SSB. This way you save 6 months because you will be joining the course commencing in Jun. Another major advantage of this action will be a big gift to you parents because you will save them huge fee which you would have paid if you were to take admission in a professional institute/college to save a year. Happy Selection! Col Pradeep Walia SSB Aspirant The Talent Bridge Jalandhar 9739915868

Yes you can if your age will be between 16.5–19.5 at the time of joining the academy. Also keep in mind that you will have to submit the photocopy of your original class 12th marksheet within a certain period of time like for all candidates studying in class 12th this year and who have given NDA & NA 2 2017, who will be subsequently clearing all the tests, will have to submit the photo copies by around 20–24 June, 2018. You can refer to the upsc notification for NDA & NA 2 2017 exam for exact details.

Yes you can apply for NDA exam while you are studying in class 12th, but the following conditions should be kept in mind:1) Your age must be between 16.5 and 19.5 on the day of reporting to the academy, provided you make it in the final merit list and get the joining letter. 2) You must be able to provide the class 12th marksheet and certificate on the day of reporting to the academy, or before the cutoff date as stipulated by the respective HQ. All the best!

Yes you can. Appear for the exam that takes place in August/September of your 10+2 academic year. If you clear the written and the subsequent rounds, you would start your training by July next year. If you are asking as per the aptitude, then definitely yes. That would be the best time I suppose as you will be in constant touch with academics which would allow you to perform well at the written examination.

Yes U can apply the forms will be available from january starting and. If your age is between 16.5 to 18.5 at the time of form available …u can apply Forms available from…. SarkariResult.com : Sarkari Results, Latest Online Form My advice to you that give your Boards best if you get 85% plus in PCM u get direct SSB call. Give JEE mains and if you get 50 marks atleast you get Navy SSB direct. All the forms available from above website Best of luck for your future plans

Hello Yes you can definitely fill the form for NDA. If you are going to opt for Navy or Air Force then you must have physics and maths subject currently, it's not compulsory for army wing. One more thing, you cannot fill the form for NDA 2018(1) i.e. April attempt because the last date was 5 Feb 2018 but you can fill the form for September attempt if you are eligible according to the age criteria. The forms will be out in May or June. Best of luck!!!!!!!!!

You can apply for the NDA/NA exam if you are in the age criteria(16.5–19.5 years old). However, the age of the candidate should be as above on the date of commencement of the course, so you can apply even when you're 16. Same applies to the eligibility i.e. your 10+2. You can apply while in +2, but your really should be out before the date of commencement of the course.

Yes you can. The minimum educational qualification for applying for NDA is 12th passed/appearing. But remember a thing you should have a 12th passed certificate at the time of taking admission in NDA. If you are currently in 12th you can apply for NDA 2020 2. All the best for your exam. Up vote and follow me for more answers related to defence aspirants.

Hari om, you are asking a question as to : “Can I prepare for the NDA from 12th class?”. Hari om. Hari om. You can prepare for NDA from being in 12th class, but you can write only after completing the 12th exams. Browse through the following links for knowing more details about the NDA exams and its eligibility criteria etc,. Odde Siva Kesavam's answer to Can I apply for the NDA exam when I am still studying in 12th? Hari om.

Of course you can. Infact the minimum eligibility criteria is such that ou cab apply for candidate when you are appearing in class 12 and one or two years after that. Most people fall out of the age criteria after graduation. So class 12 is the right time for applying for NDA

Yes you can. The selection process starting from application for written exam till joining NDA takes about 6 months. SSB - Medical examination - Merit List. The time you join NDA you should be 12 the qualified. You join somewhere in Jun and then Jan. For the Jun course you can start your process and by the time you join you are qualified too.

Yes, Class XII appearing students can give NDA exam. As NDA is most demanded exam among class XII students who seek their career as an officer in Defence Forces, So this exam has lots of competition and student need right guidance or coaching from institute like KD Education Dwarka, New Delhi that helps candidate to boost their marks in their first attempt and qualify NDA Written exam.
yes you can  Read the 2 paragraph 1st line. It's clearly mentioned

Yes ofcourse , but you have to keep two thinks in mind Your 12th standard is to be completed and you should have all the required documents at the time or before the starting of training.Your age should be b/w 16½ to 19½ at the time of commission.
No , the basic criteria is 12 pass with pcm. But I think you can apply at the end of 12 during December month of yur 12 th grade .
Yes u can apply but you must have to obtain your 10+2 certificate within their time limit, that is before beginning of your training. They will give you a time period for this.

Yes you can take NDA exam while you are studying in 12th. Every year NDA has two exams one in the month of April and other in the month of September. However even though you fail clearing the exam once you can take another attempt in the same year.
Yes, you can fill NDA form if you are presently in class 12. You just need to satisfy the age limit criteria and rest will be taken care of. Jai Hind!

Yes. You can fill the application by clicking the option you are appearing your 12th standard in your NDA UPSC application . You must be completing your 12th standard before joining the academy (that is 6to 7 months after filling of application. )
Yes ofsouce buddy u can if u ate in 12th now . Don't worry if u work hard u can definitely break the xam

yes you can apply for the NDA exam even when you are studying in class 12th because in the form it is written that you can apply when you are either 12th appearing or 12th passed. For more answers visit SSB TIPS
No. It’s better you have your result ready to increase your chances of being selected because admission is highly competitive. You can follow them on Twitter @NDARegular and get more insight.
Yes.

Yes Of course you can start preparing for NDA from class 12th itself. If you match all the eligibility criteria like age, martial status and other physical standards , NDA allows you to sit for exam while you appear for class 12th. For more info please watch : Everything about NDA Part I | NDA में सिलेक्शन हेतु सारी महत्तवपूर्ण details part 1
Yes..you can apply for NDA exam and the age limit is between 16.5 years to 19.5 years… i hope it is useful
Yes you can give NDA exam while studying in class 12 If your age is in eligible criteria. You may follow my space to get details about defence exams. Defence exam guide.
Yes you can give NDA exam according to your date of birth. First, always check the notification uf your DOB lies in it then you can give it. Regards, Azad
You can appear for NDA 2 in that case if you match the age limit of 16.5 to 19.5 years. If you are still underage you have to wait for another term.
An important question. Go to websites not one but many to learn the procedure. Another source will be coaching centres who prepare students for nda. But cross check, always
Yes, you can apply if you are falling in the age criteria. Best of luck!!
100% you can apply Forms are out
You can appear in the exam but you will not be eligible for slection in academic and to continue your nda education
Yes you can there is no such provision for after passing 12th
It totally depends on your preparation . If you are thoroughly prepared for the exam , then you will definitely crack it.
Yeah u can apply for the NDA exam if u r in class 12th.
Yes. You can fill the form.
yes definitely..!!
